events.message: I ordered a jacket last week, but it doesn't fit me at all. I would like to request a refund or exchange for a different size.
The system has identified this case as a refund request based on the customer's message mentioning refund and exchange.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah B. for handling the refund and exchange request.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us regarding the jacket. I'm here to help you with the refund or exchange process.
Could you please provide the order number and whether you prefer a refund or an exchange for a different size?
Sure, my order number is 9876543210. I would actually prefer a refund since the size I want is no longer in stock.
Thank you for the information. I have initiated your refund, which should be processed within 3 to 5 business days. You will receive a confirmation email shortly.
Thank you for the quick response and the refund confirmation. I appreciate your help.
The refund process is complete on our end. Please allow a few more days for the amount to reflect in your account.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, the refund was received today. Everything is settled now, thanks for the great service!
We are glad to hear that your refund was successful. Closing this case now. Have a wonderful day!
Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey to help us improve our service.
